name: Registeel
description: The Iron Pokémon. Registeel has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this Pokémon eats.

abilities.name: Clear Body
abilities.description: Other Pokémon's moves or abilities cannot lower this Pokémon stats.

abilities.name: Light Metal
abilities.description: This Pokémon is especially light for its species. Once per long rest, it may impose disadvantage on an attack roll against it.
